short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate random passwords as you want.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Generate random passwords wherever you are browsing the web!
The extension is totally free and open-source but you can support it by making a donation of even a few euros to support projects like this.
